notes.text:
Don’t let your memes be dreams pt.2: Electric Boogaloo 

This season took a bit longer cause I was playing around in legend with Geargia, Amazons, Aliens, SSA, Psychics.
But I decided to switch back to this classic and instantly went on a 14 game win streak. Would’ve been 15-0 if not for G R I T(seriously I hate grit with a passion) Georgias are your biggest concern. Gyokku and Hey trunade were the mvps for me.
 
Extra Deck is 3 Anki's

21 cards cause it’s obviously better then having 20 cards
